name: Dreaming of a better tomorrow (Demo)
description:
Dreaming of a better tomorrow is a game about a person who finds themselves trapped between two world, connected only by them going to sleep. What is this other world and will they be stuck like this forever?

The game includes the first day of a planned five days of game play.

This game was made by 5 people for the DevSquad academy jam that lasted 14 days.
